meanings.definition: A pain in or around a tooth.
meanings.sent1: My sister couldn't sleep because of her toothache.
meanings.sent2: I went to the dentist to get rid of my toothache.
meanings.sent3: Even the tooth fairy couldn't fix my toothache with magic.
meanings.sent4: The toothache was like a tiny monster gnawing at my gum.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing toothache felt like a drumbeat in my jaw.

meanings.definition: A sharp pain in a tooth.
meanings.sent1: Every time I bit down, a sharp toothache shot through my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The cold ice cream caused a sudden toothache in my tooth.
meanings.sent3: I tried to ignore the toothache, but it felt like a tiny dagger in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The toothache was a lightning bolt of pain in my jaw.
meanings.sent5: The toothache pulsed like a red beacon of discomfort in my mouth.
